key.name: results-font
key.summary: Font for the results text view
key.description: Specifies the font name and size to be used for displaying scan results. Format is "Font Name Size", e.g., "Monospace 10".

key.name: theme
key.description: Allows choosing between System, Light, or Dark theme. Requires application restart or dynamic switching logic.

key.name: dns-servers
key.summary: Custom DNS servers for Nmap scans
key.description: A comma-separated list of DNS servers to be used by Nmap. If empty, system DNS servers are used.
